image_slideshow.hint.effects_section.message: Apply transitions, enable looping, and set interval duration

image_slideshow.hint.browser_60_fps_mess.message: May require additional GPU/CPU resources. Note that toggling this option will trigger source refresh. For best performance, enable Browser Source Special Optimization under Tools -> Settings -> Advanced.

image_slideshow.hint.auto_refresh_images.message: Enabling this option will refresh the images automatically after every loop. However, checking this option may slow down your Image Slideshow source.

image_slideshow.hotkey_header.message: Use these hotkeys when the source is selected:

image_slideshow.hotkey_n.message: Press "**N**" to go to next slideshow image (Slideshow Mode)

image_slideshow.hotkey_b.message: Press "**B**" to go to previous slideshow image (Slideshow Mode)

image_slideshow.double_click_main.message: Double click on the main image to show thumbnails (Slideshow Mode)

image_slideshow.double_click_thumbnail.message: Double click on the thumbnail to show main image (Slideshow Mode)

image_slideshow.browse.message: Browse loaded images on thumbnails by dragging the thumbnail strip. "Lock Position" source property must be checked. (Lock position checkbox is located at the "Layout" Tab)
